meeting_annotations.speaker: Holly Goodson
meeting_annotations.transcript: Actually I think that's a very interesting question and that may also go back to this energy thing, right? If you think of things that just polymerize or assemble in a equilibrium way, it tends to be kind of slow to respond, but the steady state ones can be very quick. And it's an interesting question if one might be able to identify the situations where there's energy involved by seeing things that do respond very quickly. Other other comments either on that or or other questions that people had?
meeting_annotations.other: She uses expressive hand gestures to emphasize her points about energy and speed.
